questions: Q. 1. What do you understand by the statement that ‘‘the known reserves of these will last only few hundred years’’.
answers: Ans. The known reserves of these will last only a few hundred years is true, as we know that coal and petroleum are fossil fuels. It requires the dead organisms millions of years to get converted into these fuels. Excessive and unjudicial uses of these fuels leads to shortage of these fuels and their use is also linked to global warming. It is therefore necessary that we use these fuels only when absolutely necessary.

questions: Q. 2. What is PCRA. What are their tips ?
answers: Ans. PCRA is the Petroleum Conservation Research Association. They advise people how to save petrol/diesel while driving. Their tips are :  Drive at a constant and moderate speed.  Switch off the engines at traffic lights, or at places where you have to wait.  Ensure correct type of pressure.  Ensure regular maintenance of the vehicle.
